default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: The vow has been made. From now on, we are partners... Does this mean I can stay here in this new home with you? We'll share meals, dance together, count the stars, and enjoy all the little joys of life? Never to be apart again?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I will cherish your blessing dearly, for our eternal bond.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I make this vow, to love and cherish you always, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, in joy and in sadness, in good times and bad.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Is this your pledge to me?

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: You lifted my veil and saw how hideous I am... B-but even so, would you still be willing to give me a kiss?

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Let us gather to witness this grand wedding.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Will you stay next to me like this forever? I want to be the one to support and protect you as well.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: So even promises wither away...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Love and pain are intertwined.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Till death... do us part...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Why do you think people exchange rings? I guess perhaps it's to make promises tangible. That way... they won't easily disappear.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: What's the world like outside this castle? I used to hear guests say that in Eastside, the air smells like money and the streets are paved with gold, and even cats and dogs can sing... Is all of that true?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I wonder what happened to all those newlyweds joined in matrimony before the god of love? They all made their vows with such sincerity and affection... Surely they must all have lived happily ever after, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: There used to be a large pipe organ in the castle. The organist taught me how to play and I would help out at weddings when he was away... That's how I participated in the most important moments of some people's lives. It didn't matter that no one saw me or thanked me. I was just happy to help in my own small way.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The bride's bouquet toss represents blessings and new beginnings. They say whoever catches it will soon find their own happiness. Though I was never welcome at weddings, I always hid behind the door and watched the delighted faces of those who caught the flowers. I couldn't help but smile along... I can barely imagine how wonderful it would feel if I could catch one myself just once.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've never actually tried it, but maybe... I could make a decent wedding officiant? I mean, I'm familiar with DisCity's wedding ceremonies, and even the Outland ones. Have you... ever imagined what kind of wedding you'd have?

default.title: Greeting
default.text: I adore this little ritual... welcoming a loved one home with the softest, most devoted gaze. If only you could look at me that way too...

default.title: Idle
default.text: From the grave she rises, frost upon her wedding dress. The vows have decayed, her beloved eternally in rest...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Your hand is so warm. Is this the warmth lovers feel when they touch each other?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: One must never be late for a wedding. Not a single precious moment should be missed.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Here, this is a wedding favor I brought back from the ceremony... It symbolizes the most beautiful blessings. Take it please, will you?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: I always thought such a tender gaze was reserved only for the exchange of wedding vows... Only you look at me this way, as if I were a normal person and not some terrifying monster.
